CSAS_OUTPUT_0.OUTPUT.schema: `K` STRING KEY, `ID` BIGINT, `MIN_VALUE` DOUBLE, `NEG_MIN_VALUE` DOUBLE, `MIN_NORMAL` DOUBLE, `NEG_MIN_NORMAL` DOUBLE, `MAX_VALUE` DOUBLE, `NEG_MAX_VALUE` DOUBLE

testCase.name: DOUBLE literal min/max
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, ID bigint) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='DELIMITED');

CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS select K, id, 04.90E-324 AS MIN_VALUE, -4.9E-324 AS NEG_MIN_VALUE, 2.2250738585072014E-308 AS MIN_NORMAL, -2.2250738585072014E-308 AS NEG_MIN_NORMAL, 1.7976931348623157E308 AS MAX_VALUE, -1.7976931348623157E308 AS NEG_MAX_VALUE FROM INPUT;

sources.name: OUTPUT
